briefTitle: Synthetic Aperture Radar Detection of Breast Tumours
officialTitle: Post-CE Marking Continuing Evaluation of Multi-Static Microwave Imaging of the Female Breast in Controlled Trial to Identify Optimum Use of the MARIA Platform in the Clinical Workflow
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Sensitivity of Radio-Wave imaging in the diagnostic breast care clinic
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Referred for diagnosis because of a reported symptom of breast disease
* No previous treatment or biopsy
* Breast size 32A to breast size 42DD
* Able to lie prone on a couch for 10 minutes
* Able to remain reasonably still for 2 minutes

Exclusion Criteria:

* Breast implants
* Recent Biopsy
* Extremely small or extremely large breasts
* Presence of metal or blood lesion (haematoma)
* Breathlessness or severe arthritis
